meanings.definition: A white crystalline compound, NH2CN, used in the manufacture of herbicides and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The cyanamide was essential in producing effective herbicides.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the properties of cyanamide for medical purposes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat mistook the cyanamide for sugar and caused chaos in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as cyanamide, unwavering in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The purity of the cyanamide crystals gleamed under the laboratory lights.
